languages.text: The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} is increased by +15%. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} doubles if the wearer has not moved during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Base armour property: +15% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} if wearer is in full cover.

traits.locale_text: The wielder's cover efficiency is increased by +15%. This bonus doubles if the wielder hasn't moved during their turn. Base armour property: +15% armour if wielder is in full cover.

languages.text: La {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}eficacia de cobertura{/g} del portador aumenta un +15 %. La {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} se duplica si el portador no se ha movido durante su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Propiedad básica de armadura:+15 % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} si el usuario usa cobertura total.

traits.locale_text: La {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}eficacia de cobertura{/g} del portador aumenta un +15 %. Propiedad básica de {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g}: +15 % de armadura si el usuario usa cobertura total.

languages.text: 装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体效果{/g}提高15%。如果装备者在{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}期间没有移动过，则此{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}翻倍。 基础护甲特性：当装备者处于全身掩体中时，获得+15%{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}。

Base armour property: +15% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} if wearer is in full cover.

traits.locale_text: 装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体效果{/g}提高15%。如果装备者在{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}期间没有移动过，则此{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}翻倍。 基础{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}特性：当装备者处于全身掩体中时，获得+15%护甲。

languages.text: Un bonus de +15 % s'applique à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}efficacité de la couverture{/g} de l'utilisateur. Ce {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} est doublé si l'utilisateur ne s'est pas déplacé pendant son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Propriété d'armure de base: +15 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} si l'utilisateur bénéficie d'une couverture totale.
languages.original_text: The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} is increased by +15%. Base armour property: +15% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} if wearer is in full cover.

traits.locale_text: Un bonus de +15 % s'applique à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}efficacité de la couverture {/g} de l'utilisateur. Ce {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} est doublé si l'utilisateur ne s'est pas déplacé pendant son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Propriété d'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} de base : +15 % d'armure si l'utilisateur bénéficie d'une couverture totale.

languages.text: Die {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckungseffizienz{/g} wird um +15 % erhöht. Dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} verdoppelt sich, wenn sich der Träger während seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} nicht bewegt hat. Grundeigenschaft Rüstung: +15 % {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g}, wenn der Träger volle Deckung hat.
languages.original_text: The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} is increased by +15%. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} doubles if the wearer has not moved during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Base armour property: +15% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} if wearer is in full cover.

traits.locale_text: Die {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckungseffizienz{/g} wird um +15 % erhöht. Dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} verdoppelt sich, wenn sich der Träger während seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} nicht bewegt hat. Grundeigenschaft {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g}: +15 % Rüstung, wenn der Träger volle Deckung hat.

languages.text: 使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}遮蔽物効率{/g}が+15%上昇する。この{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}は、使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}中に移動しない場合2倍になる。 基本アーマー特性：使用者が完全に遮蔽物されている場合、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}+15%。
languages.original_text: The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} is increased by +15%. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} doubles if the wearer has not moved during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Base armour property: +15% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} if wearer is in full cover.

traits.locale_text: 使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}カバー効率{/g}が +15%上昇する。この{/g}ボーナスは、使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}中に移動しない場合2倍になる。 基本{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}特性：使用者が完全にカバーされている場合、アーマー +15%。

languages.text: Увеличивает {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}эффективность укрытия{/g} на 15%. Если в свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} персонаж не двигается, этот {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} удваивается. Базовое свойство: +15% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} за полным укрытием.

languages.text: Giyen kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}siper etkililiği{/g} +%15 artar. Giyen kişi o {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turda{/g} hiç hareket etmemişse bu {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} ikiye katlanır. Taban zırh özelliği: Giyen kişi tam siperdeyse +%15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g}.
